This incident follows a similar act of vandalism at a BAPS temple in Chino Hills, California, less than six months ago.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/reprehensible-act-indian-temple-in-us-vandalised-consulate-seeks-probe/articleshow/123275155.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/reprehensible-act-indian-temple-in-us-vandalised-consulate-seeks-probe/articleshow/123275155.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 13:13:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="985007" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123275239,imgsize-985007.cms"/></item><item><title>'Flaw in our system': Shashi Tharoor weighs in on SC dog relocation order</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/flaw-in-our-system-shashi-tharoor-weighs-in-on-sc-dog-relocation-order-urges-redirection-of-funds-to-ngos/articleshow/123282087.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/flaw-in-our-system-shashi-tharoor-weighs-in-on-sc-dog-relocation-order-urges-redirection-of-funds-to-ngos/articleshow/123282087.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 18:33:34 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="616278" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123282105,imgsize-616278.cms"/></item><item><title>'No cricket tours to Pak ...': Govt outlines authority over India’s participation</title><description><![CDATA[India's National Sports Governance Bill, a landmark reform, is set for implementation within six months, according to Sports Minister Mansukh Mandaviya. The bill establishes the National Sports Board and Tribunal, aiming for enhanced accountability. It grants the government power to restrict international participation in extraordinary circumstances, citing national security or global emergencies.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/national-sports-governance-bill-no-cricket-tours-to-pakistan-since-2008-govt-outlines-authority-over-indias-global-sports-participation/articleshow/123281856.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/national-sports-governance-bill-no-cricket-tours-to-pakistan-since-2008-govt-outlines-authority-over-indias-global-sports-participation/articleshow/123281856.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 18:36:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="110532" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123282199,imgsize-110532.cms"/></item><item><title>'Anti-Tamil Nadu activities': Cong to boycott governor Ravi's Independence Day tea party</title><description><![CDATA[The Tamil Nadu Congress has announced a boycott of Governor R.N. Ravi's Independence Day tea party, citing his "anti-Tamil Nadu activities," including the rejection of a bill to establish a university named after former chief minister M Karunanidhi. The party also protests the Election Commission's voter list revision in Bihar.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/anti-tamil-nadu-activities-congress-to-boycott-governor-rn-ravis-independence-day-tea-party-to-skip-event-for-2nd-straight-year/articleshow/123280891.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/anti-tamil-nadu-activities-congress-to-boycott-governor-rn-ravis-independence-day-tea-party-to-skip-event-for-2nd-straight-year/articleshow/123280891.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 17:49:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="535709" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123281273,imgsize-535709.cms"/></item><item><title>Perplexity, itself valued at $18 billion, offers $34.5 billion for Google Chrome</title><description><![CDATA[Perplexity, an AI search startup, has made a bold $34.5 billion all-cash offer to acquire Google's Chrome browser, aiming to challenge Google's search dominance. This move comes as Google faces antitrust pressure to divest Chrome. Perplexity pledges significant investment in Chrome's development and open-source nature, while maintaining user choice and continuity.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/aravind-srinivas-perplexity-itself-valued-at-18-billion-makes-a-34-5-billion-all-cash-offer-to-buy-google-chrome/articleshow/123264202.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/aravind-srinivas-perplexity-itself-valued-at-18-billion-makes-a-34-5-billion-all-cash-offer-to-buy-google-chrome/articleshow/123264202.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 12 Aug 2025 23:26:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ABHINAV KAUSTUBH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="25744" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123264204,imgsize-25744.cms"/></item><item><title>Tragic shocker! Para-athlete dies after rabid dog attack</title><description><![CDATA[In a tragic incident, para-athlete Jogendra Chhatria and Hrusikesh Rana succumbed to rabies 19 days after being bitten by a stray dog in Balangir district. Despite receiving anti-rabies vaccinations, their condition worsened, leading to their deaths. The incident has sparked outrage in the village, prompting calls for action against rabid dogs.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/tragic-shocker-para-athlete-dies-after-rabid-dog-attack/articleshow/123280329.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/more-sports/others/tragic-shocker-para-athlete-dies-after-rabid-dog-attack/articleshow/123280329.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 17:11:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="131010" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123280420,imgsize-131010.cms"/></item><item><title>Stray dog order: How world tackles strays — from sterilisation drives to euthanasia</title><description><![CDATA[Amid rising stray dog bites, the Supreme Court has ordered the removal of all stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters, banning their return to the streets. The order warns of strict action against obstruction. Globally, effective strategies include universal microchipping, large-scale CNVR/TNVR programs, rabies control, adoption pipelines, and abandonment enforcement.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/sc-stray-dog-order-row-how-world-manages-its-stray-dog-populations-from-sterilisation-drives-to-strict-pet-laws/articleshow/123276613.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/sc-stray-dog-order-row-how-world-manages-its-stray-dog-populations-from-sterilisation-drives-to-strict-pet-laws/articleshow/123276613.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 16:31:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="455567" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123281092,imgsize-455567.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Evidence of crime’: Congress challenges BJP over Sonia Gandhi voter ID claim</title><description><![CDATA[The Congress party is demanding that the BJP provide evidence to support claims that Sonia Gandhi possessed a voter ID before becoming an Indian citizen. Pawan Khera also requested result data from the Varanasi constituency, questioning PM Modi's victory margin.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/evidence-of-crime-congress-challenges-bjp-over-sonia-gandhi-voter-id-claim-flags-pm-modis-thin-victory-in-varanasi/articleshow/123280822.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/evidence-of-crime-congress-challenges-bjp-over-sonia-gandhi-voter-id-claim-flags-pm-modis-thin-victory-in-varanasi/articleshow/123280822.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 17:30:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1227421" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123280876,imgsize-1227421.cms"/></item><item><title>China to Donald Trump: Sorry, we don't want your 'Obsolete' Nvidia AI chips</title><description><![CDATA[Chinese regulators are reportedly pressuring tech giants like Alibaba and ByteDance to reduce orders for Nvidia's H20 AI chips, favoring domestic alternatives. This scrutiny, led by the MIIT, requires firms to justify purchasing Nvidia chips over local options like Huawei and Cambricon. The move complicates Nvidia's export arrangement, potentially impacting its H20 sales in China.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/china-to-donald-trump-sorry-we-dont-want-your-obsolete-nvidia-ai-chips/articleshow/123281810.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/china-to-donald-trump-sorry-we-dont-want-your-obsolete-nvidia-ai-chips/articleshow/123281810.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 18:15:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68686" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123281786,imgsize-68686.cms"/></item><item><title>WATCH: 'Only thing I can do with broken foot … ' — Rishabh Pant turns chef</title><description><![CDATA[Rishabh Pant, currently sidelined with a fractured right foot sustained during the England Test series, is keeping his spirits high by indulging in pizza baking. He shared a light-hearted video on social media, showcasing his culinary skills while humorously acknowledging his lack of cooking at home. Pant's playful attitude and pizza-making adventures are keeping him busy during his recovery.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-only-thing-i-can-do-with-broken-foot-rishabh-pant-turns-chef-in-viral-video/articleshow/123281063.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/watch-only-thing-i-can-do-with-broken-foot-rishabh-pant-turns-chef-in-viral-video/articleshow/123281063.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 17:46:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45168" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123281235,imgsize-45168.cms"/></item><item><title>Convocation row: Scholar snubs TN governor; Annamalai hits out at DMK</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/convocation-row-scholar-snubs-tamil-nadu-governor-annamalai-hits-at-dmk-for-low-grade-politics/articleshow/123280339.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/convocation-row-scholar-snubs-tamil-nadu-governor-annamalai-hits-at-dmk-for-low-grade-politics/articleshow/123280339.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 17:14:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="994484" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123280419,imgsize-994484.cms"/></item><item><title>Jaishankar to visit Russia, hold talks with Lavrov amid tension with US</title><description><![CDATA[External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar will meet Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov on August 21. This meeting follows increased tariffs imposed by the US on Indian imports. National Security Advisor Ajit Doval recently met Russian President Vladimir Putin. Discussions during that meeting were not disclosed. Putin is expected to visit India before the end of 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jaishankar-to-visit-russia-eam-to-hold-talks-with-lavrov-trip-comes-amid-tension-with-us/articleshow/123276511.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/jaishankar-to-visit-russia-eam-to-hold-talks-with-lavrov-trip-comes-amid-tension-with-us/articleshow/123276511.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 14:28:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="195744" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123276689,imgsize-195744.cms"/></item><item><title>GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke: There is no world where I would allow employees to say...</title><description><![CDATA[GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke mandated the use of the platform for all employees, emphasizing its integral role in the company culture. Under his leadership, GitHub experienced significant growth, particularly with AI-powered development tools like GitHub Copilot. However, Dohmke has recently resigned to pursue entrepreneurial ventures, leading to GitHub's integration into Microsoft's CoreAI team by the end of 2025.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-there-is-no-world-where-i-would-allow-employees-to-say-well-sorry-i-dont-want-to-use-github-if-that-is-the-case-you-can-/articleshow/123274635.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/github-ceo-thomas-dohmke-there-is-no-world-where-i-would-allow-employees-to-say-well-sorry-i-dont-want-to-use-github-if-that-is-the-case-you-can-/articleshow/123274635.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 12:36:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19408" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123274616,imgsize-19408.cms"/></item><item><title>Yuzvendra Chahal's estranged wife Dhanashree Verma dances with Big Boss winner - WATCH</title><description><![CDATA[Indian cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal's divorce from Dhanashree Verma was finalized on March 20, 2025, in Mumbai. The event grabbed attention when Chahal arrived at the family court wearing a T-shirt that read, “Be Your Own Sugar Daddy.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/yuzvendra-chahals-estranged-wife-dhanashree-verma-dances-with-big-boss-winner-watch/articleshow/123281456.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/yuzvendra-chahals-estranged-wife-dhanashree-verma-dances-with-big-boss-winner-watch/articleshow/123281456.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 18:04:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="62398" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123281588,imgsize-62398.cms"/></item><item><title>When India pulled out of Asia Cup — And the big story behind it</title><description><![CDATA[The 2025 Asia Cup will be held in the UAE from September 9-28, featuring eight teams in the T20I format. India's participation was initially uncertain due to strained relations with Pakistan, but the BCCI has confirmed their presence. India will play Pakistan in a high-profile match on September 14, with potential for multiple encounters throughout the tournament.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/when-india-pulled-out-of-asia-cup-and-the-big-story-behind-it/articleshow/123279629.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/when-india-pulled-out-of-asia-cup-and-the-big-story-behind-it/articleshow/123279629.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 16:55:32 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24530" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123279992,imgsize-24530.cms"/></item><item><title>KBC17 promo: Women officers share courageous stories from Op Sindoor</title><description><![CDATA[Kaun Banega Crorepati 17's Independence Day special will feature three inspiring women officers: Colonel Sofiya Qureshi, Wing Commander Vyomika Singh, and Commander Prerna Deosthalee. A promo reveals their experiences from Operation Sindoor, highlighting the importance of responding to Pakistan's actions. The episode, airing August 15th, has generated excitement, with viewers eager to witness the officers' courage and insights.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/kaun-banega-crorepati-17-promo-women-officers-sofiya-qureshi-vyomika-singh-and-prerna-deosthalee-share-courageous-stories-from-operation-sindoor/articleshow/123279928.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/hindi/kaun-banega-crorepati-17-promo-women-officers-sofiya-qureshi-vyomika-singh-and-prerna-deosthalee-share-courageous-stories-from-operation-sindoor/articleshow/123279928.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 16:46:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>etimes.in</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="47248" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123279924,imgsize-47248.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Coolie’ first review: Udhayanidhi Stalin hails Rajinikanth’s 50 years in cinema</title><description><![CDATA[Udhayanidhi Stalin congratulated Rajinikanth on his 50th year in film and praised 'Coolie' after a preview. He lauded the film as a power-packed entertainer, anticipating global success. Stalin extended wishes to the cast and crew, including Nagarjuna, Sathyaraj, Aamir Khan, and Shruti Haasan, heightening anticipation for the film's release in over 100 countries.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/coolie-first-review-udhayanidhi-stalin-calls-lokesh-kanagarajs-directorial-a-power-packed-mass-entertainer-and-hails-rajinikanths-50-years-in-cinema/articleshow/123280390.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/coolie-first-review-udhayanidhi-stalin-calls-lokesh-kanagarajs-directorial-a-power-packed-mass-entertainer-and-hails-rajinikanths-50-years-in-cinema/articleshow/123280390.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 17:07:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="39590" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123280375,imgsize-39590.cms"/></item><item><title>Journalists’ articles, videos prima facie not sedition: SC</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has shielded 'The Wire' editor Siddharth Varadarajan from arrest under Section 152 of the BNS, cautioning against implicating journalists for news articles. Justices emphasized that a news report doesn't inherently threaten national unity, even while hearing a case against the validity of Section 152.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/any-good-law-can-be-misused-or-abused-supreme-court-journalists-articles-videos-prima-facie-not-sedition-says-top-court/articleshow/123268610.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/any-good-law-can-be-misused-or-abused-supreme-court-journalists-articles-videos-prima-facie-not-sedition-says-top-court/articleshow/123268610.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 05:56:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57384" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123268649,imgsize-57384.cms"/></item><item><title>Travis Kelce’s dad praises Taylor Swift’s The Life of a Showgirl: ‘It’s going to be beautiful’</title><description><![CDATA[Taylor Swift revealed her new album, *The Life of a Showgirl*, on the *New Heights* podcast, hosted by Travis and Jason Kelce, surprising even Ed Kelce. Swift has been working on the album in LA after securing the rights to her first six albums.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/taylor-swifts-new-album-the-life-of-a-showgirl-gets-a-big-shoutout-from-travis-kelces-dad-ed-kelce-its-going-to-be-beautiful/articleshow/123279111.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/taylor-swifts-new-album-the-life-of-a-showgirl-gets-a-big-shoutout-from-travis-kelces-dad-ed-kelce-its-going-to-be-beautiful/articleshow/123279111.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 16:31:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="75002" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123279586,imgsize-75002.cms"/></item><item><title>Wilson's wife Ciara first descendant of enslaved Africans to get Benin citizenship under new law</title><description><![CDATA[Ciara, the Grammy-winning singer, has made history by becoming one of the first to receive Beninese citizenship through a program aimed at reconnecting descendants of enslaved Africans. This initiative seeks to heal historical wounds and strengthen ties with the Black diaspora. Human error and equipment failure also play significant roles, debunking myths of supernatural forces.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/bermuda-triangle-mystery-solved-scientist-explains-the-real-cause-behind-vanishings-of-ships-and-planes/articleshow/123279571.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/bermuda-triangle-mystery-solved-scientist-explains-the-real-cause-behind-vanishings-of-ships-and-planes/articleshow/123279571.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 16:35:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="72254" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123279602,imgsize-72254.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Thai teen brutally thrashes female teacher over 2 marks</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/watch-thai-teen-brutally-thrashes-female-teacher-furious-over-losing-2-marks-in-exam/articleshow/123274899.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/watch-thai-teen-brutally-thrashes-female-teacher-furious-over-losing-2-marks-in-exam/articleshow/123274899.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 14:09:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="609391" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123276324,imgsize-609391.cms"/></item><item><title>Exclusion of Aadhaar from Bihar SIR: SC observes 11 docs more 'voter friendly' than 7</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has observed that the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) in Bihar, requiring 11 documents, is more voter-friendly than the previous summary revision's seven. The hotel cited police instructions against accommodating guests from Bangladesh, Punjab, and Jammu & Kashmir, which the police denied issuing. OYO has apologized, removed the hotel from its platform, and initiated an inquiry into the incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/bengali-row-noida-hotel-turns-away-new-town-techie-son/articleshow/123265181.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kolkata/bengali-row-noida-hotel-turns-away-new-town-techie-son/articleshow/123265181.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 00:00:51 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TAMAGHNA BANERJEE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1331073" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123274660,imgsize-1331073.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Will look into it’: CJI Gavai on SC stray dogs order</title><description><![CDATA[Chief Justice of India BR Gavai has assured to review a plea challenging the Supreme Court's recent directive to relocate all stray dogs in Delhi-NCR to shelters. The matter was brought to the CJI's attention, highlighting a previous order by another bench against the killing and relocation of community dogs, emphasizing compassion for all living beings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-look-into-it-cji-gavai-on-stray-dogs-order-supreme-court-had-earlier-barred-relocation-killing/articleshow/123274157.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/will-look-into-it-cji-gavai-on-stray-dogs-order-supreme-court-had-earlier-barred-relocation-killing/articleshow/123274157.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 12:13:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1702674" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123274148,imgsize-1702674.cms"/></item><item><title>IPL: LSG set to part ways with Zaheer Khan; new mentor to hold more responsibilities</title><description><![CDATA[Lucknow Super Giants are set to part ways with mentor Zaheer Khan ahead of IPL 2026. The former India pacer also handled bowling duties during his tenure. Whoever will replace Zaheer will have expanded responsibilities across RPSG Group’s global cricket franchises.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/ipl-lsg-set-to-part-ways-with-zaheer-khan-new-mentor-to-hold-more-responsibilities/articleshow/123276288.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/ipl/ipl-lsg-set-to-part-ways-with-zaheer-khan-new-mentor-to-hold-more-responsibilities/articleshow/123276288.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 14:07:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRATYUSH RAJ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="173044" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123276301,imgsize-173044.cms"/></item><item><title>BJP digs up 1980 poll roll with Sonia's name; claims she became Indian in 1983</title><description><![CDATA[BJP has retaliated against Congress's 'vote chori' allegation, asserting that Sonia Gandhi's name appeared on electoral rolls in 1980, before she became an Indian citizen. Amit Malviya highlighted this as a violation of electoral law. Anurag Thakur presented alleged discrepancies in Congress-held constituencies, accusing the party of historical electoral malpractices.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-bjp-rebuts-congress-fraud-claim-alleges-discrepancies-in-opposition-held-seats/articleshow/123275319.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/vote-chori-row-bjp-rebuts-congress-fraud-claim-alleges-discrepancies-in-opposition-held-seats/articleshow/123275319.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 13:52:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1126221" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123276280,imgsize-1126221.cms"/></item><item><title>Infiltration bid foiled in Uri: 1 soldier killed in action; operation under way</title><description><![CDATA[An infiltration attempt along the Line of Control in Jammu & Kashmir's Uri sector was foiled by the army, resulting in the death of a soldier during the exchange of fire. Security forces have been on high alert following intelligence inputs suggesting possible infiltration attempts from across the LoC and the international border.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infiltration-bid-along-loc-forces-foil-border-crossing-attempt-in-uri-operation-under-way/articleshow/123269373.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infiltration-bid-along-loc-forces-foil-border-crossing-attempt-in-uri-operation-under-way/articleshow/123269373.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 13 Aug 2025 10:38:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="746822" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123272269,imgsize-746822.cms"/></item></channel></rss>
